alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 11:03PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Outflow winds will impact portions of southeastern Hooker, northwestern Lincoln, western Logan, eastern McPherson and southwestern Thomas Counties through 1130 PM CDT/1030 PM MDT/... At 1101 PM CDT/1001 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms extending from 12 miles northeast of Tryon to near Ringgold to 10 miles north of Hershey. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tryon, Ringgold and Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 201 and 225. Highway 97 between mile markers 3 and 43. Highway 83 between mile markers 133 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT/midnight MDT/ for southwestern, north central and west central Nebraska.
